On Mai 06, 2025, we will host an kickoff event for all students who are interested in joining BEARS. 
Every project will shortly introduce themself and you can ask all question. Also there will be free fries!!!
The event will take place at 18:00 in room F11 (ground floor) in the [RFT building](https://maps.app.goo.gl/sixUKMx4wxruqQFr8).

Dare the limits and join us there!
